body: I'm not sure why there are duplicated forward slash in the directory of the HDR image file for the glare analysis. Advice is appreciated! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/UZ2c0LeJP4G909QRvwHeAJ9D5Uab6gXL2ndVLDsri1hWXUtsIL0Edm7zFktptKg34HCWeKczx3M5F2Bx8lSx-xypJAIsmX24/Image3.png)
